allow: Bash(powershell -Command "Set-Location ''D:\prog\Pre-DateGrip''; if (Test-Path build) { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force build }; Get-ChildItem -Filter ''*.sln'' -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Remove-Item -Force; Get-ChildItem -Filter ''*.vcxproj*'' -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Remove-Item -Force; Write-Host ''Cleaned up old files''")
